abstract: Bob and Harvey Weinstein, the brothers who founded Miramax before selling it to Walt Disney, may be gearing up to make a second, sweetened bid for the film studio, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Bob and Harvey Weinstein, the brothers who founded Miramax before selling it to Walt Disney, may be gearing up to make a second, sweetened bid for the film studio, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Are the Weinsteins positioned to to get a second chance at buying Miramax?

headline.main: Weinsteins Said to Eye Sweetened Bid for Miramax
